column2: Vela is located in beautiful Monteverde, famous for its rare and gorgeous cloud forest and friendly community.
Comfortable rooms and suites overlook lush gardens with panoramic views of the Arenal Volcano.

Each of the 210 modern guest rooms have wireless internet and satellite TV.
